Strictly Come Dancing evictee David James has been liking his former dance partner's steamiest snaps.

The pair may have crashed out of the dance contest in Week Five, but they seem to be on very good terms as Nadiya's posts receive a thumbs-up from David.

Pro dancer Nadiya is no stranger to a sexy lingerie snap or too, and David seems keen that they keep up.

They hit up the red carpet at the Pride of Britain Awards last night and were spotted holding hands as they made their way into London's Grosvenor House Hotel.

While David rocked a classic blue three piece suit with a pair of glistentingly white trainers, Nadiya opted for a sheer, barely-there black gown.

(Image: Instagram)

(Image: Instagram)

The public appearance comes after they were snapped sharing a kiss following the filming of Strictly spin-off It Takes Two.

Fans reckoned the pair had become the latest dance couple to fall victim to the fated Strictly curse.

David's shrugged off the rumours though, insisting that their connection isn't a romantic.

(Image: Instagram)

(Image: Mike Marsland/WireImage)

Speaking on the red carpet to The Sun Online , the former England goalkeeper: "No romance, no. That wasn't part of the deal. But she's a great teacher."

They were given the boot from Strictly after failing to win over the judges in a dance off with Mike Bushell and Katya Jones.

They had fans reaching for the tissues as they gushed over each other after being told they were eliminated. Afterwards, they took to the floor for a final time to Simple Minds' Don't You Forget About Me.'

David had already survived two dance offs in Weeks Two and Three - he managed to outdo James Cracknell and Anneka Rice to dance another day.

The Daily Mirror Pride of Britain Awards, in partnership with TSB, will broadcast on ITV on 5th November at 8pm.
description: The former footballer was also seen holding hands with his dancing partner at last night's Pride of Britain Awards
